rules_text:
Vigilance
[i]Augmented[/i] – Whenever Jacque attacks, if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, you may exile any number of target nonland permanents, then return them to the battlefield tapped under their owners' control.
flavor_text: [i]“Slyten is awesome! I got telekinesis and weird visions of fractal trees.”[/i]
